body:
The Input geometry had 4 values whereas the BFsurface component output 3.
I flattened and it solved the issue.

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sBKqczAM5hJ05jyvalLYeAjNTTjHx*9RdbLT6AFDA5V-IYI5Uj*A*a55rc0rHoHlVtuO3OBeKl2gUiEKojdIFfchQ13WrXZm/ScreenShot20160911at23.31.19.png)I am running it now... crossing fingers. Will update here.

Olivier
